top_note: This proposal outlines the costs for the roof and gutter replacement project for the two structures (Main House and Shed/Garage) located at 442 Randolph Ave, Front Royal, VA 22630.
bottom_note: This proposal is designed to provide a comprehensive and durable roofing system that meets or exceeds all regulatory requirements. The scope of work and all line items within this estimate are based on applicable local and state building codes, including the International Residential Code (IRC).
disclaimer:
This estimate expires 30 days from issue date
Prices subject to material cost fluctuations after 30 days
Work authorization requires signed contract and initial deposit
Contractor reserves right to verify all measurements prior to final contract

items.name: Remove existing shingles (1 layer)
items.dec: Complete removal of existing 3-tab shingles from 1005 sqft roof area

items.name: Remove underlayment
items.dec: Removal of all existing felt or underlayment material

items.name: Deck re-nailing
items.dec: IRC R803.2.3 compliance to meet uplift code

items.name: Synthetic underlayment
items.dec: Full roof coverage with new synthetic underlayment

items.name: Ice & water barrier
items.dec: Code-required protection for eaves (56 LF x 2 rows)

items.name: Asphalt shingles (3-tab)
items.dec: New roof installation per material request

items.name: Starter shingles
items.dec: Required for wind resistance and shingle warranty. Eaves length 55ft 10in

items.name: Waste allowance
items.dec: 10% standard material waste for simple gable roof

items.name: Drip edge installation
items.dec: IRC R905.2.8.5 code requirement. Eaves (56 LF) + Rakes (72 LF)

items.name: Flashing replacement
items.dec: Standard flashing replacement for vents and edges

items.name: Ridge vent installation
items.dec: IRC R806.2 attic ventilation requirement. Ridge length 27ft 11in

items.name: Gutter replacement
items.dec: Installation of new seamless aluminum gutters along eaves

items.name: Downspout installation
items.dec: Installation of new downspouts and elbows per request

items.dec: Code-required protection for eaves (123 LF x 2 rows) and valleys (27 LF)

items.dec: New roof installation per material request

items.name: Waste allowance
items.dec: 12% material waste for complex roof with 7 facets

items.name: Drip edge installation
items.dec: IRC R905.2.8.5 code requirement. Eaves (123 LF) + Rakes (122 LF)

items.name: Chimney flashing - Copper
items.dec: New copper counter and step flashing per IRC R903.2

items.dec: New copper step flashing (34ft 6in) per request

items.name: Pipe jack flashing
items.dec: Replacement of existing plumbing vent flashing

items.dec: Installation of new metal in open valleys (27ft 0in)

items.name: Accessory Painting
items.dec: Painting of pipe jacks and vents to match roof color

items.name: Ridge vent installation
items.dec: IRC R806.2 attic ventilation requirement. Ridge length 75ft 1in

items.name: Turtle vent - Metal
items.dec: Replacement of existing static vent

items.name: Flue cap replacement
items.dec: Replacement of 3 flue caps as requested

items.name: Gutter replacement

items.name: Downspout installation
items.dec: Installation of new downspouts and elbows (Assumed qty)

items.name: Slope charge (Medium 7/12)
items.dec: Increased labor and safety for 7/12 predominant pitch roof

items.name: Fall protection harness
items.dec: OSHA 1926.501(b)(13) compliance for crew safety

items.name: Property protection
items.dec: Landscape and siding protection; insurance requirement

items.name: Site preparation
items.dec: Initial deck inspection and project area preparation

items.dec: 30 yard container for duration of project

items.dec: Combined hauling fee for all project debris
